div.p: Be Respectful. Be Ready. Be Responsible. It starts with YOU.
Be Respectful. Be Ready. Be Responsible. It starts with YOU.
Be Respectful. Be Ready. Be Responsible. It starts with YOU.
Be Respectful. Be Ready. Be Responsible. It starts with YOU.

span.p: Unfortunately, the annual Cumberland Education Foundation Dinner, Light a Legacy, is cancelled due to COVID-19 restrictions. We hope to see you next year!
Cumberland School District sent an UPDATED letter home to all families on 04/01/20 regarding COVID-19. A copy of that letter can be found here.
Information on the COVID-19 Virus from the Cumberland School District

p.span: All after-school activities, practices, sporting events, Community Education offerings, and extracurricular activities are cancelled until further notice. Thank you.
